version.changelog: NEW features: . > Set selected items/tracks to default color action button (selection dependent) . > Set color to empty Custom Color Palette Box simply by clicking . > Reset single Custom Color Palette Box with right click . > Added ReaImGui installation checking

version.author: olshalom, vitalker
version.changelog:
NEW features: > Set selected items/tracks to default color action button (selection dependent) > Set color to empty Custom Color Palette Box simply by clicking > Reset single Custom Color Palette Box with right click > Added ReaImGui installation checking
Appearance: > Redesigning Palette menu settings > Renamed/added some GUI text for better comprehensibility
Bug fixes: > Fixed gradient function > General code updates > Cornercase bugfixes
